name: DeadDrop
0:
”Alexa, launch Dead Drop”
”Alexa, tell Dead Drop to leave a message under the bed that says I'm not a monster I promise”
”Alexa, ask Dead Drop to look for messages inside The Statue of Liberty”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dead drop
des:
Leave a message for someone to find. Let your creativity shine through when you leave a message at any place you can think of. Try under your bed or at the public library and then wait to see if anyone finds it and replaces your message.

Set up a special location with one or more of your friends and leave messages for each other anonymously. Be careful though! Anyone who can guess your location will be able to hear your message.



Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
